item.title: GraphQL API docs
item.description: Context As Inomial was developing their GraphQL API library, I created this project as a proof of concept for how we could document and present the API documentation. Action Using Read the Docs as the hosting platform, content was written in reStructuredText and generated with Sphinx. Links
